p:
Xylopia ochrantha Mart. is an endemic Annonaceae species from Brazil and is popularly known as “imbiú-prego”. There is little information regarding the chemical, pharmaceutical, and biological activities from this species.
12
,
13 Thus, this work aimed to identify the chemical composition of essential oil from X. ochrantha leaves and to evaluate the activity of a nanoemulsion produced with this oil on the developmental stages (oviposition) and mortality of different Biomphalaria species.
